reviews.review:
Need I say best First Person Shooter out there in terms of strategy and utilising the source engine like so many before it. This is no rushing COD-esque shoot em up with whiney kids and no skill gap, but a game settled wholey on skill whether you're playing standard vanilla Search and Destroy, or one of a community servers that offers Gun Game or something like Death Run- much like Gmod with it's great players that go to the effort of setting up custom servers like these.
As for the way the game plays out, well it's physics work much like Half Life 2's does, in the way that there is restricted movement, no sprint, so there's no running from a gunfight. The balancing of the weapons is very well done, especially in terms of mid range assault rifles, clear favourites seeming to be the M4 and AK. However the way in which you purchase these said weapons at the start of each round in a game of search is you get a set amount of money based on your performance through the game. So the better you played last round, the more money you get for the next, and the more money means better guns and equipment, simple right?
Of course this game is a cult classic amongst PC gamers and it really does well for the community in how it's part of E-sports, tournaments held all over the world. This game is no pass time, Counter Strike is a way of life.

The second best Counter Strike game next to Condition Zero. The Source engine is beautiful and everything is polished and runs flawlessly. I remember spending entire weekends just playing this game with friends online. This is one of the games that is timeless and will never cease to be fun. In my opinion games like this where you don't have ADS (Aim Down Sight) are more difficult to master and bring more of a challenge to players.
i can click on people except i dont need to because anywhere within a 20 mile radius counts as their head

I've had tons and tons of fun with this game, so much mods and so much maps, this game gets a real bang for its buck and plus if you play Gmod a lot this game comes in handy since a lot of addons in Gmod require CSS files

Counter-Strike: Source is a fantastic game that never gets old.

I was an avid player of this game through my childhood and now that I'm returning to PC gaming I decided to pick up the bundle to relive those days and try out the other iterations. I'm happy to report that it's just as fun as it ever was; the crazy game modes, the plethora of maps and the community.

Overall, I can't speak highly enough of Counter-Strike: Source, it's an excellent game and you should try it out.
Really nice game. A bit hard for beginners though.
